templates.title: Coyotech WinterForge 1G
templates.description: A docker template which provides a Moddable Minecraft Forge server (Any version) configured with a max of 1GB of RAM and 1 CPU cores of resources.
templates.note: If you need to access the console, use an SSH client to access port 222. Sign in as root, combined with the password you created above.

templates.title: Coyotech WinterForge 2G
templates.description: A docker template which provides a Moddable Minecraft Forge server (Any version) configured with a max of 2GB of RAM and 1.5 CPU cores of resources.
templates.note: If you need to access the console, use an SSH client to access port 222. Sign in as root, combined with the password you created above.

templates.title: Coyotech WinterForge 4G
templates.description: A docker template which provides a Moddable Minecraft Forge server (Any version) configured with a max of 4GB of RAM and 2 CPU cores of resources.
templates.note: If you need to access the console, use an SSH client to access port 222. Sign in as root, combined with the password you created above.
